__TOC__

On the page you would like to link your new article click to '''edit'''

Add your link using the format <code>[link]</code>. Instead of the word 'link' use a mixture of lowercase and upper case such as <code>[MyNewArticleForTheGuide]</code> for your link. Then save the page.

Now click the link to <code>MyNewArticleForTheGuide</code> and you will see a page creation template which looks like:

 <nowiki>[[File:newpage.png]]</nowiki>

click the link to '''create new empty page''' and then write your article in the space provided. Save your page when you have finished and you have created a new article on the link 

<code>MyNewArticleForTheGuide</code>
